main.name: Rohan Chhabra
main.description: I love building and designing software. Currently, pursuing my passion to build real life software projects at Visa Inc
main.bio: I possess a predilection for writing code which is capable of doing dramatic things. Love playing around with technologies like JAVA, Golang and React. My leisure and pleasure is watching cricket and writing poems, content, essays etc. I possess an unusual propensity to learn vocabulary using etymology. Currently learning Spanish for fun and appreciating the similarities it possesses with English and Hindi as they belong to the same Indo-European language family
main.contactmessage: Well, not a counsellor but just keep learning! That's what I am doing now!
